actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator McClure. With written report No. 98-11.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 29.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: An original bill to amend the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 (43 U.S.C. 1701) to permit temporary use by Federal departments and agencies of public lands controlled by the Bureau of Land Management, Department of the Interior.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to allow Federal departments and agencies to use, occupy, and develop public lands administered by the Bureau of Land Management through temporary use permits.

titles.title: An original bill to amend the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 (43 U.S.C. 1701) to permit temporary use by Federal departments and agencies of public lands controlled by the Bureau of Land Management, Department of the Interior.
